title: Did CNN bury the story of Justin Damon because she was a white woman killed by the Black Muslim immigrant from Somalia?
subtitle: CNN, along with many other major media outlets around the world, covered Dammond's shooting in great detail.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: CNN (and other news media) buried the story of Justin Dammond's shooting because she was white and the officer who shot her was a black Muslim immigrant.
